alert.note: Alert for Clay (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 4:23PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clay and northeastern Cass Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 423 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Argusville, or 15 miles north of Fargo, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Northern Fargo, West Fargo, Mapleton, Harwood, Reile`s Acres, Oakport and Argusville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 65 and 86. Interstate 94 in North Dakota between mile markers 336 and 344. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
